titles.title: Congressional Pay Raise bill
To provide that rates of pay for Members of Congress shall not be increased as a result of any adjustment otherwise scheduled to take effect in fiscal year 2006.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 10/25/2005--Introduced. Prohibits a Member of Congress from receiving during FY2006 a cost of living adjustment under the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.
